{
  "name": "flax-template-sdk53",
  "main": "index.ts",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "expo start",
    "reset-project": "node ./scripts/reset-project.js",
    "android": "expo start --android",
    "ios": "expo start --ios",
    "web": "expo start --web",
    "lint": "expo lint",
    "_____ VITE _____": "_",
    "viteWeb": "vite --host",
    "build": "tsc && vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "_____ FIREBASE _____": "_",
    "firebase:init": "npx firebase-tools init",
    "firebase:projects-list": "npx firebase-tools projects:list",
    "firebase:set-project": "npx firebase-tools use xxxprj_name",
    "deploy:complete:web": "yarn export:web:clear && yarn deploy:hosting",
    "deploy:hosting": "npx firebase-tools@12.9.0 deploy --only hosting",
    "firebase:login": "npx firebase-tools login",
    "firebase:login:ci:old": "npx firebase-tools login --no-localhost",
    "firebase:login:ci": "npx firebase-tools@12.9.0 login --no-localhost",
    "deploy": "npx firebase-tools deploy --only functions"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@expo/vector-icons": "^14.1.0",
    "@react-navigation/bottom-tabs": "^7.3.10",
    "@react-navigation/elements": "^2.3.8",
    "@react-navigation/native": "^7.1.6",
    "css-to-react-native": "^3.2.0",
    "expo": "~53.0.8",
    "expo-blur": "~14.1.4",
    "expo-constants": "~17.1.6",
    "expo-font": "~13.3.1",
    "expo-haptics": "~14.1.4",
    "expo-image": "~2.1.7",
    "expo-linking": "~7.1.4",
    "expo-router": "~5.0.6",
    "expo-splash-screen": "~0.30.8",
    "expo-status-bar": "~2.2.3",
    "expo-symbols": "~0.4.4",
    "expo-system-ui": "~5.0.7",
    "expo-web-browser": "~14.1.6",
    "firebase": "^11.7.0",
    "react": "19.0.0",
    "react-dom": "19.0.0",
    "react-native": "0.79.2",
    "react-native-gesture-handler": "~2.24.0",
    "react-native-reanimated": "~3.17.4",
    "react-native-safe-area-context": "5.4.0",
    "react-native-screens": "~4.10.0",
    "react-native-svg": "^15.11.2",
    "react-native-svg-web": "^1.0.9",
    "react-native-web": "~0.20.0",
    "react-native-webview": "13.13.5",
    "zustand": "^5.0.4"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.25.2",
    "@types/react": "~19.0.10",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^4.3.1",
    "vite": "^5.3.1",
    "eslint-config-expo": "~9.2.0",
    "typescript": "~5.8.3",
    "eslint": "^9.25.0"
  },
  "private": true
}
